# Layer

```
  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  | stage                                                   |
  |                                                         |
  |  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  |  | header                                                  |
  |  |                                                         |
  |  |  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  |  |  | row                                                     |
  |  |  |                                                         |
  |  |  | +------++------++------++------++------++------++------++------+
  |  |  | | cell || cell || cell || cell || cell || cell || cell || cell | ......
  |  |  | +------++------++------++------++------++------++------++------+ 
  |  |  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  |  |     :                                                   |
  |  |                                                         |
  |  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  |                                                         |          
  |  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  |  | body                                                    |
  |  |                                                         |
  |  |  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  |  |  | row                                                     |
  |  |  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  |  |  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  |  |  | row                                                     |
  |  |  |                                                         |
  |  |  | +------++------++------++------++------++------++------++------+
  |  |  | | cell || cell || cell || cell || cell || cell || cell || cell | ......
  |  |  | +------++------++------++------++------++------++------++------+ 
  |  |  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  |  |     :                                                   |
  |  |                                                         |
  |  +---------------------------------------------------------+
  |                                                         |  
  +---------------------------------------------------------+  
```
